import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import news_img from '../../assets/images/news-img1.jpg'; import stroller from '../../assets/images/ads/stroller2.gif'; import sidebar_ads1 from '../../assets/images/ads/thumb.gif'; import Navbar from '../common/header/navbar/Navbar'; import Footer from '../common/footer/Footer'; import Latest from '../common/footer/bulletins/Latest'; import { Tabs, Tab } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Popular from '../common/footer/bulletins/Popular'; import DoubleFeature from '../home_category/DoubleFeature'; import ThumbnailList from '../home_category/Thumbnail'; export default function Politics(){ return(
  • প্রচ্ছদ🢒
  • বাংলাদেশ🢒

) }
